Dear Arun,

 

Thanks for the email.

 

Quantum is KWD 1,607.92 / AED 19,300

Dear Arun,

 

Please respond to our below inquiries:

 

*	Please clarify why this was only notified to Apollo on August 1.

*	As highlighted earlier, the cargo was delivered on July 23 in clean condition. Since this was only notified to your team five days after delivery and highlighted to the forwarders on August 1, please provide proof that the cargo was damaged upon receipt.

 

In addition, please share the contact person for survey.

Dear Arun,

 

Thanks.

 

*	Please clarify why this was only notified to Apollo on August 1.
*	Please send an official notice holding Apollo liable for this incident.
*	Since you have not answered whether this cargo is still available for survey, we assume it is no longer available—please confirm.
*	As highlighted earlier, the cargo was delivered on July 23 in clean condition. Since this was only notified to your team five days after delivery and highlighted to the forwarders on August 1, please provide proof that the cargo was damaged upon receipt.

 

Kindly note that the above communication or requirements are not exhaustive. Issued on “without prejudice” basis.

 

Best Regards,

 

Vic Eldrin Munar

P.O. Box 32505, Dubai – United Arab Emirates

chunks.text:
CAUTION: External Email. Do not click links or open attachments unless this email comes from a known sender and you know the content is safe.

 

Dear @Vic Eldrin Munar <mailto:Vic.Munar@gig-gulf.com> 

 

*	Please clarify why this was only notified to Apollo on August 1. ( claim was confirmed on August 1st )
*	Please send an official notice holding Apollo liable for this incident. ( we have already notified agent and email already shared )
*	As highlighted earlier, the cargo was delivered on July 23 in clean condition. Since this was only notified to your team five days after delivery and highlighted to the forwarders on August 1, please provide proof that the cargo was damaged upon receipt ( kindly clarify if the shipment has big volume do you expect to receive with in same day and notify for claim )

[GIG] We have seen and handled larger volumes than this 8-pallet shipment, and the final consignee has notified earlier than five days in such cases. As stipulated in the Important Clause of the policy, it remains the duty of the insured and their agents, in all circumstances, to take the necessary measures to avert or minimize any loss and to ensure that all rights against carriers, bailees, or other third parties are duly preserved and exercised.

 

Furthermore, as the policy is subject to the Land Transit Clause, the maximum period permitted to notify the forwarders or carriers in this case is 72 hours. Failure to comply within this timeframe prejudices our recovery rights.

chunks.text:
Furthermore, as the policy is subject to the Land Transit Clause, the maximum period permitted to notify the forwarders or carriers in this case is 72 hours. Failure to comply within this timeframe prejudices our recovery rights.

 

Finally, this is an AED 19,000 claim involving 659 damaged pieces. Such a quantum is likely to indicate that something went wrong at the time of delivery and should not have been acknowledged with a clean delivery note.

 

Thanks

Regards

ARUN ASHOKAN

Dear @Vic Eldrin Munar <mailto:Vic.Munar@gig-gulf.com> 

 

*	Please clarify why this was only notified to Apollo on August 1. ( claim was confirmed on August 1st )
*	Please send an official notice holding Apollo liable for this incident. ( we have already notified agent and email already shared )
*	As highlighted earlier, the cargo was delivered on July 23 in clean condition. Since this was only notified to your team five days after delivery and highlighted to the forwarders on August 1, please provide proof that the cargo was damaged upon receipt ( kindly clarify if the shipment has big volume do you expect to receive with in same day and notify for claim )

chunks.text:
*	Please clarify why this was only notified to Apollo on August 1. ( claim was confirmed on August 1st )
*	Please send an official notice holding Apollo liable for this incident. ( we have already notified agent and email already shared )
*	As highlighted earlier, the cargo was delivered on July 23 in clean condition. Since this was only notified to your team five days after delivery and highlighted to the forwarders on August 1, please provide proof that the cargo was damaged upon receipt ( kindly clarify if the shipment has big volume do you expect to receive with in same day and notify for claim )

[GIG] We have seen and handled larger volumes than this 8-pallet shipment, and the final consignee has notified earlier than five days in such cases. As stipulated in the Important Clause of the policy, it remains the duty of the insured and their agents, in all circumstances, to take the necessary measures to avert or minimize any loss and to ensure that all rights against carriers, bailees, or other third parties are duly preserved and exercised.

 

Furthermore, as the policy is subject to the Land Transit Clause, the maximum period permitted to notify the forwarders or carriers in this case is 72 hours. Failure to comply within this timeframe prejudices our recovery rights.

 

Finally, this is an AED 19,000 claim involving 659 damaged pieces. Such a quantum is likely to indicate that something went wrong at the time of delivery and should not have been acknowledged with a clean delivery note.

 

Thanks

Regards

ARUN ASHOKAN

​​​​

SENIOR COORDINATOR ‑ SHIPPING

REAL FZE

chunks.text:
CAUTION: External Email. Do not click links or open attachments unless this email comes from a known sender and you know the content is safe.

 

Dear @Vic Eldrin Munar <mailto:Vic.Munar@gig-gulf.com> 

 

*	Please clarify why this was only notified to Apollo on August 1. ( claim was confirmed on August 1st )
*	Please send an official notice holding Apollo liable for this incident. ( we have already notified agent and email already shared )
*	As highlighted earlier, the cargo was delivered on July 23 in clean condition. Since this was only notified to your team five days after delivery and highlighted to the forwarders on August 1, please provide proof that the cargo was damaged upon receipt ( kindly clarify if the shipment has big volume do you expect to receive with in same day and notify for claim )

[GIG] We have seen and handled larger volumes than this 8-pallet shipment, and the final consignee has notified earlier than five days in such cases. As stipulated in the Important Clause of the policy, it remains the duty of the insured and their agents, in all circumstances, to take the necessary measures to avert or minimize any loss and to ensure that all rights against carriers, bailees, or other third parties are duly preserved and exercised.

 

Furthermore, as the policy is subject to the Land Transit Clause, the maximum period permitted to notify the forwarders or carriers in this case is 72 hours. Failure to comply within this timeframe prejudices our recovery rights.

chunks.text:
Furthermore, as the policy is subject to the Land Transit Clause, the maximum period permitted to notify the forwarders or carriers in this case is 72 hours. Failure to comply within this timeframe prejudices our recovery rights.

 

Finally, this is an AED 19,000 claim involving 659 damaged pieces. Such a quantum is likely to indicate that something went wrong at the time of delivery and should not have been acknowledged with a clean delivery note.

 

Thanks

Regards

ARUN ASHOKAN

​​​​

SENIOR COORDINATOR ‑ SHIPPING
